title: [Herbalist's Wagon]
description: Large, circular windows filled with a myriad of tiny, leaded panes flood this wagon with moonlight.  The potted plants, perched on anything resembling a flat surface, appear to thrive here.  Only a small space on the counter is kept clear for the transaction of business.
